amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__.The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $124,800,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 511).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 511).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. McCollum.
